objects.description: Monitor Registry creation for services that may start on safe mode. For example, a program can be forced to start on safe mode boot by adding a \* in front of the "Startup" value name: HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\["\*Startup"="{Path}"] or by adding a key to HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\SafeBoot\Minimal.(Citation: BleepingComputer REvil 2021)(Citation: Sophos Snatch Ransomware 2019)
